Running Reports

Contents | Index

The Reports wizard allows you to run a report for the active screen. Different reports are associated with each screen. You can view, print, and export reports.

You can limit report data by running a query before running the report.

To run a report
  1. Navigate to the screen that contains the information for which you want to run a report.
  2. On the Siebel application toolbar, click the Reports button to see a list of available preconfigured reports. The list specifies which reports are available as Actuate reports and which are available as Oracle Business Intelligence Publisher reports. From the list you can access individual reports.
  3. Click the report you want to run.
    The report appears in a new browser window.
